biography.placeOfBirth: Buitenzorg, Buitenzorg, Dutch East Indies [now Bogor, West Java, Indonesia]
biography.bio: Suzzanna was born on October 14, 1942 in Buitenzorg, Buitenzorg, Dutch East Indies as Suzanna Martha Frederika van Osch. She was an actress, known for La reine de la magie noire (1983), Nyi blorong (1982) and Samson and Delilah (1987). She was married to Clift Sangra and Dicky Suprapto. She died on October 15, 2008 in Magelang, Central Java, Indonesia.
biography.name: Suzzanna

biography.bio: Clift Sangra is an actor, known for I Want to Get Even (1987), Perkawinan nyi blorong (1983) and Dia sang penakluk (1984). He has been married to Suzzanna since 1983.
biography.name: Clift Sangra

biography.bio: Soendjoto Adibroto is an actor, known for Perkawinan nyi blorong (1983), Samson and Delilah (1987) and Di luar batas (1984).
biography.name: Soendjoto Adibroto

biography.bio: Ade Irawan is an actress, known for Ungu Violet (2005), Perkawinan nyi blorong (1983) and Nyi blorong (1982).
biography.name: Ade Irawan

biography.bio: Ruth Pelupessi is an actress, known for Satan's Slave (1982), Ferocious Female Freedom Fighters (1982) and Perkawinan nyi blorong (1983).
biography.name: Ruth Pelupessi

biography.placeOfBirth: Teloekbetoeng, Lampongsche Districten, Dutch East Indies [now Bandar Lampung, Lampung, Indonesia]
biography.bio: H.I.M. Damsyik was born on March 14, 1929 in Teloekbetoeng, Lampongsche Districten, Dutch East Indies as Haji Incik Muhammad Damsyik. He was an actor, known for Kembalinya si janda kembang (1992), Samson and Delilah (1987) and Satan's Slave (1982). He died on February 2, 2012 in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
biography.name: H.I.M. Damsyik

biography.bio: S. Parya is known for his work on Satan's Slave (1982), Perkawinan nyi blorong (1983) and Maidens Revenge (1987).
biography.name: S. Parya

biography.bio: Atut Agusman is an actor, known for Koral le justicier (1984), Malaikat bayangan (1988) and Perkawinan nyi blorong (1983).
biography.name: Atut Agusman

biography.bio: Tina Ariestiana is an actress, known for Perkawinan nyi blorong (1983).
biography.name: Tina Ariestiana

biography.bio: Ermina Zaenah is an actress, known for Berdjumpa kembali (1955), Perkawinan nyi blorong (1983) and Pegawai tinggi (1954).

biography.bio: Torita Murni is an actress, known for The Hungry Snake Woman (1986) and Perkawinan nyi blorong (1983).
